summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 1st Avenue Northwest from West 42nd Street to West 45th Street and westerly roadway, from West 45th Street to West 47th Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16689 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
